item.title: Ashish Kujur: Contact
item.description: You may reach me via: Email: ashishkujur23@iisertvm.ac.in, kujur.ash@gmail.com Phone: +919668264604 or via my socials: Twitter GitHub Yes, I am aware that this page is essentially redundant because these links can be found in the footer.

item.title: Ashish Kujur: Interesting Links
item.description: This is a compilation of links that I find might be of some help to the budding (function theoretic) operator theorist: OTTER - Operator Theory Talks for Early Researchers FOCAHA - Forum of Complex And Harmonic Analysis Complex Analysis Lab Focus Program on Analytic Function Spaces and their Applications Operator Theory Information Network Here are some lecture notes on some topics related to Operator Theory that one may find useful:
